data.message:
400 years and counting of colonialism, imperialism ,neo-colonialism european power in a African face and counting and genocide , chemical warfare targeting our African family unit's and communities in the form of drug's for the drugs to be used as a pretext to lock up our African people on a mass level never seen in history to work for slave wages and to take the African man away from his family unit so he is not there to help protect, produce, and build powerful African family unit's and a european killing a African every 28 hours for no logical reason other then being African and that's only what's reported and turning our African women into sex object's in systematically created conditions of poverty for the world and systematically created conditions of misinformation, and a lack of the true history of our African people being the founder's of civilization and it's root element's like mathematics,agriculture, architecture, military science,navigation, first to travel the world and first humans on earth, economics, politics, and law, and so much more and it will not stop until official African revolutionary organizations and the Crip Nation , Blood Nation, and GD Nation , and other lost African street tribes form logical alliances and wage war on pin pointed european target's and outside and inside enemy's of the African masses at home Black Africa and world wide on A political level, economical level, and military level combined in the interest of the African masses and the African masses having political power, economical power and military Power , and Africa's natural resources and human resources used in the interest of the masses of africans at home and world wide. Anthony X Made it to page 300 in Slavery by Another Name: The Re-Enslavement of Africans from the Civil War to World War II
Book by Douglas A. Blackmon...................Seeing how the european ruling class the families that got rich and powerful off the Enslavement of our African people and still are down to there agent's and organizations like the F.B.I, C.I.A and the other ABC's we know about and ones we don't know about and low level europeans that all play there part in Enslavement of our African people, mass rape, mass killing and other crimes against humanity i personally don't want to hear any thing about the Crip Nation, Blood Nation and GD Nation and other lost African street tribes ...Well it will be better when they operate on a political level, economical level, and military level in the interest of the African masses with African revolutionary leadership yes in do time but while living ,fighting , killing, and dying under colonialism, imperialism, neo-colonialism european power in a African face , genocide, mass rape , sex slavery among other crimes against humanity a sector of African people are systematically forced into created conditions to the point that they do thing's they other wise would not do like being Re-Enslaved and some of our people wonder why we must have our own United Nation at home Black Africa and world wide for the African masses to have Political Power, Economical Power, Military Power why you may ask well let's see here europeans have been running operations of colonialism ,imperialism ,neo-colonialism european power in a African face , genocide, mass rape , sex slavery and slavery among other crimes against humanity of our African people for like 400 year's and there still going strong at it thus when that critical mass start's shooting back on a political level, economical level, and military level in the interest of the African masses with African revolutionary leadership ....The european ruling class the families that got rich and powerful off the Enslavement of our African people and still are down to there agent's and organizations like the F.B.I, C.I.A and the other ABC's we know about and ones we don't know about and low level europeans that all play there part in the operations of colonialism ,imperialism ,neo-colonialism european power in a African face , genocide, mass rape , sex slavery and slavery you europeans and agent's will have no logical reason to bitch . Anthony X That time in history when African kid's look up too and want to be operating in high level professions and not be dope dealers or banging on other African's but banging on the european ruling class and there agent's and organization's and low level european's in the African liberation Army when they reach the age of 18 and up and past the proper training and choose to walk the path of a African warrior and not Nation building by operating in high level professions or being business men and women (from block to block well connected and organized in the interest of the African masses). Anthony X Forget about the possibility of living in peace with europeans because there is no possibility of living in peace with europeans any place in the world with europeans they doing nothing more then mass killing, mass rape, and stolen land and it's elements thats there history for like 6000 years yet were still here what are they doing to day from the european ruling class and the agents and organizattions we know about and ones we don't know about, and low level europeans that all play a part in the process of mass killing, mass rape, and stolen land and it's elements, slavery,colonialism ,imperialism, neo-colonialism european power in a African face the only language europeans understand is economical, political, and military blood shed of there enemies combined the same language a critical mass of Africans are being forced to speak economical, political, and military blood shed of our 400 year and counting old open enemies combined we as african people can be that revolutionary organization or this revolutionary organization, or be in this college or be in this college , or work for this european or that european , or own this business or own that business , or run this block or that block that we don't own, or kill and work in the interest of the european ruling class be working in the europeans police or military force and not taking that trainning back to the Crip Nation, Blood Nation, GD Nation with African revolutionary leadership the bottom line is that the european ruling class gives orders to there agent's and or organizations and low level europeans to wage war on the African masses and other non europeans and some low level europeans on a economical level, political level , and military level that the only logical response is for our African revolutionary organizations and the Crip Nation, Blood Nation, GD Nation and other non europeans form alliances nation wide and world wide and wage war on a economical level, political level , and military level in the interest of the African masses and other oppressed humans around the world for World liberation, African nation hood, A united Africa , political, economical, military power in the hands of the African masses and Africas natural resources and human resources used in the interest of the masses of africans at home and world wide now thats African and non european power. Anthony X

replies.message: Bruh dont act like you know shit when u just copy and pasted all that stuff just to sound smart
